messages.zh: 通向宝藏的旅途总归不会一帆风顺，麻烦总是接踵而至，而其中大部分明显不懂得何为公平决斗。
messages.en: The journey toward the treasure will not always be smooth sailing, trouble follows afoot, and most obvious are those who don’t understand the concept of what a fair fight is.

messages.zh: 你，你把我的同伴，全干掉了？
messages.en: You, you taken out my teammates?
... Don’t, Don’t come any closer! I beg you!

messages.zh: 我、我把金币都给你！我把我的武器给你！你要什么我都——
messages.en: I, I’ll give you all the gold I have! I’ll even give you my weapon! I'll give you anything --

messages.zh: 你们两个，跟上。小心脚底，跟着我的脚印走，手也不要到处摸。
messages.en: You two, keep up. Watch your step. Follow my footsteps. And don't touch anything.

messages.zh: 这片森林，恐怕比你我想的还要危险。
messages.en: I'm afraid this forest is more dangerous than you or I think.

messages.zh: 石头上是不是刻了什么？
messages.en: Was there something carved on that rock?

messages.zh: 这是赏金猎人留下的符号。不按照符号指示行动的话，就会踩进设置好的陷阱。
messages.en: Those were bounty hunter's symbols. If you don't follow them, you'll step into a trap.

messages.zh: 我们要直接躲开陷阱吗？
messages.en: Should we just avoid the trap?

messages.zh: ——绊索加捕兽夹，老土的小把戏。
messages.en: Tripwire trap, what an old trick.

messages.zh: 树丛恰好挡住了摆锤，一旦贸然前进就会被击中。
messages.en: The bush covered the pendulum, if you rush forward recklessly you’ll get hit.

messages.zh: 那里，可萝尔小姐，小心点。
messages.en: Stop there, Miss Carol. Be careful.

messages.zh: 你再向前走一步，大概就会掉进满是尖头的深坑了。
messages.en: If you take one more step forward, you will probably fall into a pit full of sharp pointy ends.

messages.zh: 不愧是赏金猎人，很擅长这些嘛。
messages.en: As expected of a bounty hunter, you’re really good at this.
Of course I am, after all, I used to --

messages.zh: 想要绕开陷阱是不现实的。果然，还是要全部解除掉才方便行动。
messages.en: It’s not realistic to try to avoid the trap. Sure enough, it’s more convenient to disarm them all.

messages.zh: 毕竟他们最危险的道路，马上就会变成对我们来说最安全的那种了。
messages.en: Their most dangerous path, after all, will soon be the safest one for us.

messages.zh: 这什么意思？这么多年来，我都没见过有人用过这个符号。
messages.en: What does that mean? I haven't seen anyone use this symbol in all these years.

messages.zh: 斯卡蒂，你是斯卡蒂，没错吧？
——原来滴水村村长是和你在一起？
messages.en: --So the village chief was with you all along.

messages.zh: 格拉尼，她的眼神，不太对啊。
messages.en: Grani, something doesn’t seem right about her eyes.

messages.zh: 不，可萝尔小姐，鲍勃大叔.....

messages.en: She -- how could she attack you?

messages.zh: 你不是认识她，她怎么就——
messages.en: Didn’t you say you know her. How could she --
Don't ask so many questions now! Come on, run!

messages.zh: 哈，哈，她还在追着我们跑吗？？
messages.en: Ha, ha, is she still chasing after us??

messages.zh: 格，格拉尼，我，我跑不动了......
那个女人，真的，是怪物吧？她甚至，都没在喘气啊！
messages.en: That woman really is a freak! She's not even short on breath!

messages.zh: 为什么我要陪你们浪费时间？
messages.en: Why am I wasting my time with you?

messages.zh: 她真的要砍了我，啊不，她要拿可萝尔小姐干什么！
messages.en: She's really gonna cut me down. Oh no, what is she intending to do with miss Carol!

messages.zh: 她的眼睛，好，好红.....格，格拉尼！
messages.en: Her eyes are, very, red... G-Grani!

messages.zh: 不行了不行了，为什么还会有这种事啊！
messages.en: I can't I can't, how could this happen?

messages.zh: 就是她，那个突袭我们的灾星！快，快射她！
messages.en: That's her, the walking disaster who attacked us! Come on! Shoot her!

messages.zh: 虽然不知道为什么她要追我，但好歹也是我的同事！
messages.en: While I don’t know why she chased me, but she is still my colleague!

messages.zh: 为、为什么要坏我的事！混账——！
messages.en: W-why are you ruining everything! You bastard--!
Let’s break to the east! Go!

messages.zh: 别想逃出去！受死吧怪物！！
messages.en: Don't even think about getting out! Die monster!!
(Aegir language) Get out of my way!
